title: Krave Burger
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Fast food joint with local food, including a fully vegan burger (ask for no butter on the bun when you order) made with lentils, sweet potatoes, black beans and corn. Also has a vegan green salad, onion rings, fries and sweet potato fries.
